text: Lincoln is a city in Burleigh County, North Dakota, United States. It is a suburb of Bismarck. The population was 4,257 at the 2020 census, making it the 14th largest city in North Dakota. Lincoln was founded in 1977. == References == Category:1977 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in North Dakota Category:20th-century establishments in North Dakota
title: Lincoln, North Dakota
